summary: When Solo, the writer of one book, runs out of money for therapy, his therapist suggests getting a dog. Problems arise.
cast: Giovanni Ribisi|Lynn Collins|Scott Caan|Kevin Corrigan|Mena Suvari|Sarah Shahi|Tito Ortiz|Kimo Leopoldo|Brian Goodman|Jennifer Carpenter|Laura Katz|Joanna Krupa|Crispian Belfrage|Med Abrous|Melissa Keller|Liz Carey|Jimmy the Dog|Steve Jones|Don Cheadle|Curt Clendenin|Lara Coulter|Melvin Jackson Jr.|Hana Mae Lee|Danny Minnick|Ali Pomerantz
title: The Dog Problem
